mapper.select: select * from tbl_dog order by dno desc
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tbl_dog (dogname, size, breed, gender, age, dogarea, dogimg, dogcontent) VALUES (#{dogname}, #{size}, #{breed}, #{gender}, #{age}, #{dogarea}, #{dogimg}, #{dogcontent})
mapper.update: update tbl_dog set dogname = #{dogname}, size = #{size}, breed = #{breed}, gender = #{gender}, age = #{age}, dogarea = #{dogarea}, dogimg = #{dogimg}, dogcontent = #{dogcontent}, updatedate = now() where dno = #{dno}
